synopsis.text: Bottle Battles in the virtual Drink World set the stage for Kouta Kouka's ambitious journey to become the world's ultimate Bottle King. Alongside his loyal Bottleman partner, Colamaru, Kouta engages in thrilling battles against a diverse array of rivals, determined to outshine them all and claim the coveted title. This action-packed anime follows their adventures, struggles, and triumphs as they strive to reach the pinnacle of the Bottle Battle world.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
